trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 系統需求

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 系統需求

trans-unit.source: This topic lists the system requirements for [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], and for special features, such as [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)], CIM commands, and workflows.
trans-unit.target: 本主題列出 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 的系統需求，以及特殊功能 (例如 [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]、CIM 命令和工作流程) 的系統需求。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_1](../Token/winblue_client_1_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_1](../Token/winblue_server_1_md.md)] include all required programs.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_1](../Token/winblue_client_1_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_1](../Token/winblue_server_1_md.md)] 包括所有必要的程式。

trans-unit.source: This topic is designed for users of earlier releases of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 本主題是針對舊版 Windows 使用者所設計。

trans-unit.source: Operating System Requirements
trans-unit.target: 作業系統需求

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 是在下列版本的 Windows 上執行。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] (預設會安裝)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] (預設會安裝)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] (含 Service Pack 1)，安裝 [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) 來執行 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] (含 Service Pack 1)，安裝 [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) 來執行 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 是在下列版本的 Windows 上執行。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)] (預設會安裝)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] (預設會安裝)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] (含 Service Pack 1)，安裝 [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) 來執行 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] (含 Service Pack 1)，安裝 [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) 來執行 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] with Service Pack 2, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] (含 Service Pack 2)，安裝 [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) 來執行 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Microsoft .NET Framework Requirements
trans-unit.target: Microsoft .NET Framework 需求

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 需要完整安裝 Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] 預設會包括 Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 需要完整安裝 Microsoft .NET Framework 4。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default, which fulfills this requirement.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] 預設會包括 Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (這滿足此需求)。

trans-unit.source: To install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝 Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe)，請參閱 Microsoft 下載中心上的 [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919)。

trans-unit.source: To install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Web Installer)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝 Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) 的完整安裝，請參閱 Microsoft 下載中心上的 [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Web 安裝程式)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931)。

trans-unit.source: WS\-Management 3.0
trans-unit.target: WS-Management 3.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] require WS\-Management 3.0, which supports the WinRM service and WSMan protocol.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 需要可支援 WinRM 服務和 WSMan 通訊協定的 WS-Management 3.0。

trans-unit.source: This program is included in [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0, and [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此程式包括在 [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)]、Windows Management Framework 4.0 和 [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] 中。

trans-unit.source: Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] require Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0 (WMI).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 需要 Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0 (WMI)。

trans-unit.source: This program is included in [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0, and [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此程式包括在 [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)]、Windows Management Framework 4.0 和 [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] 中。

trans-unit.source: If this program is not installed on the computer, features that require WMI, such as CIM commands, do not run.
trans-unit.target: 如果電腦上未安裝此程式，則不會執行需要 WMI 的功能 (例如 CIM 命令)。

trans-unit.source: Common Language Runtime 4.0
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime 4.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] are compiled against Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 是針對 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0 所編譯。

trans-unit.source: Graphical User Interface Requirements
trans-unit.target: 圖形化使用者介面需求

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] is a console\-based application that does not require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] 是不需要圖形化使用者介面的主控台應用程式。

trans-unit.source: As such, is it well suited to computers that do not have screens or monitors, or a user interface, such as the Server Core installation options of [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，它也適用於沒有螢幕或監視器的電腦或者使用者介面 (例如 [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] 的 Server Core 安裝選項)。

trans-unit.source: However, some items, such as the following, require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: 不過，某些項目 (例如下列項目) 需要圖形化使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the help topic for each item.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資料，請參閱每個項目的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Out-GridView
trans-unit.target: Out-GridView

trans-unit.source: Show-Command
trans-unit.target: Show-Command

trans-unit.source: Show-ControlPanelItem
trans-unit.target: Show-ControlPanelItem

trans-unit.source: Show-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Show-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: **ShowWindow** parameter of the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) Cmdlet 的 **ShowWindow** 參數。

trans-unit.source: **ShowSecurityDescriptorUi** parameter of the [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) and [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) 和 [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) Cmdlet 的 **ShowSecurityDescriptorUi** 參數。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Engine Requirements
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 引擎需求

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] is designed to be backwards compatible with [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 設計成與 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 舊版相容。

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets, providers, snap\-ins, modules, and scripts written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] run unchanged in [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 中，針對 [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 所撰寫的 Cmdlet、提供者、嵌入式管理單元、模組和指令碼會以現狀執行。

trans-unit.source: However, due to a change in the runtime activation policy in Microsoft .NET Framework 4, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] host programs that were written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] and compiled with Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 cannot run without modification in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], which is compiled with CLR 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為 Microsoft .NET Framework 4 中執行階段啟用原則的變更，所以在 [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] (使用 CLR 4.0 所編譯) 中，必須修改才能執行針對 [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 所撰寫以及使用 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 所編譯的 [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] 主程式。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 at a minimum.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 引擎至少需要 Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727。

trans-unit.source: This requirement is fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1 可滿足這項需求。

trans-unit.source: This requirement is not fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 4 and later releases of Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft .NET Framework 4 和更新版本的 Microsoft .NET Framework 不滿足這項需求。

trans-unit.source: For information about adding or installing the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine, and adding or installing the required versions of the Microsoft .NET Framework, see [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需新增或安裝 [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 引擎以及新增或安裝所需 Microsoft .NET Framework 版本的資訊，請參閱[安裝 Windows PowerShell 2.0 引擎](../Topic/Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需啟動 [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] 引擎的資訊，請參閱[啟動 Windows PowerShell 2.0 引擎](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md)。

trans-unit.source: Windows Preinstallation Environment
trans-unit.target: Windows 預先安裝環境

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] run in the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] 是在 Windows 預先安裝環境 (Windows PE) 中執行。

trans-unit.source: However, the following cmdlets are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不支援下列 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Background Intelligent Transfer Service (BITS) Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: 背景智慧型傳送服務 (BITS) Cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Get-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Get-WinEvent[PSITPro5_Diagnostic]
trans-unit.target: Get-WinEvent[PSITPro5_Diagnostic]

trans-unit.source: Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Save-Help

trans-unit.source: Update-Help
trans-unit.target: Update-Help

trans-unit.source: Also, the **WinRm** service is not present on Windows PE.
trans-unit.target: 此外，Windows PE 上沒有 **WinRm** 服務。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.target: 開始使用 Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.target: 安裝 Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.target: 啟動 Windows PowerShell [ps]
